name: No Control (Vertex)
description:
No Control - It will split your brain in 2

Join Our Discord Squad:

  • https://discord.gg/spHTBsV

Come Say Hi to my youtube channel:

  • https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoB--f-BocHJtIBcs8xXt7w
Game Play:

You move the Cube with the arrow above it  BUT The other cube will always move in the opposite direction!

GOAL?

Get both cubes inside the Outlined Squares as FAST AS POSSIBLE THAT'S IT! Sounds Easy?Well its not!

Controls:
  • Move = WASD | Arrow Keys
  • Restart Level = R
How To Install:
  • Download Zip
  • Unzip It
  • Click the .exe file
  • Enjoy
Team:
  • Solo Developer:Valeri Shnaider - https://twitter.com/VertexGames4
  • Music by: Mount West - https://twitter.com/MountWestMusic

Post your best scores in the comment below and lets see who is the best here!
